name: Codeastu Technologies
tagline: Perfect Technology Partner For your next Big Idea
description: CodeAstu Technologies is company with global presence in India. We are software services Company with a curious and passionate team of technocrats. We are a fun-loving and talented team, who loves working together and we have a passion for building remarkable software products that people love. We have dedicated team of experienced professionals who has objective of serving customers with our skills and go beyond their expectation by providing best technical solutions.
